name: Credit Block Reason
description: This field only applies to items with credit block.
The value is determined by the open items in customer account:
- If static credit check status is "not OK" and net balance is positive, then it is "Exceeds Credit Limit / Past Due"
- If static credit check status is "not OK" and net balance is 0 or negative, then value is "Exceeds Credit Limit"
- If there is at least one open item, then "Past Due"; otherwise, it's "Exceeds Credit Limit"
